basics.name: Oluwadara Adedeji
basics.label: Ph.D. student and aspiring Machine Learning Engineer
basics.summary: Experienced data science (DS) and machine learning (ML) professional, with 3+ years of experience in various areas of DS and ML. Current focus is on harnessing the use of DS and ML methodologies for healthcare and enterprise solutions. My ultimate goal is to see models transcend Jupyter notebooks to actual deployment, and to solve real world problems.

work.name: SFI Centre for Research Training in Machine Learning
work.summary: Research at the intersection of mental health, finance and machine learning

work.name: CyLab/ Upanzi network
work.summary: Deep Learning system for signature verification and animal biometrics. Machine learning for smishing detection

work.name: CyLab/ Upanzi network
work.summary: Deep Learning system for signature verification and animal biometrics

volunteer.organization: Data Science Club, Carnegie Mellon University Africa
highlights: Participated in the Umoja-Hack, Africa’s inter-university machine learning competition. and emerged the highest-ranking team in Rwanda in the intermediate category

volunteer.summary: Organized Conversation Cafes, workshops and other events of the organization. Facilitator at a Capacity Building Workshop, to celebrate the 2018 World Mental Health day.
highlights: Awarded volunteer of the month for October, 2018

awards.title: Mastercard Foundation Scholarship Award
awards.summary: Full Masters scholarship to study Engineering Artificial Intelligence at Carnegie Mellon University Africa

awards.title: Dean’s Award for First Class students in the Faculty of Technology
awards.awarder: Dean, Faculty of Technology, University of Ibadan
awards.summary: Academic award for being one of the 27 graduating First Class students in the Faculty of Technology, University of Ibadan.

awards.title: Etisalat Merit Award for Academic Excellence, 2015 and 2016
awards.summary: Two-time awardee of this academic award to outstanding students in Electrical & Electronic Engineering, Computer Science and Economics in selected universities in Nigeria.

awards.title: Winner, 2016 Etisalat Innovation Moment Challenge
awards.summary: I was in a team of 10 from the University of Ibadan awarded the best innovative idea amongst ideas presented by Etisalat Merit Awards awardees from selected tertiary institutions in Nigeria

awards.title: 2015/2016 NNPC/Total Undergraduate National Merit Award
awards.summary: Academic award to outstanding students in Nigerian tertiary institutions.

awards.title: MTN Foundation Science and Technology Scholarship Phase 6
awards.summary: Academic award to outstanding students in science and technology in tertiary institutions in Nigeria.
